openapi: 3.0.3
x-snyk-api-stability: experimental
info:
  title: api
  version: 3.0.0
servers:

paths:

    delete:
      description: Get an instance of things
      operationId: getThings
      parameters:
        - { $ref: '../../common.yaml#/parameters/ThingsId' }
      responses:
        '204':
          description: Returns an instance of things
